General.Name: Easyhome New Retail Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Easyhome New Retail Group Corporation Limited engages in the operation and management of chain stores under the Easy Home brand in China. It provides furniture, construction and decoration materials, marketing, and advertising and promotion services. As of December 31, 2021, the company has operated 421 home furnishing stores, including 95 directly operated stores and 326 franchised stores, as well as 7 modern department stores, 1 shopping mall, and 137 supermarkets of various types. It also invests, develops, manages, and leases real estate properties. Easyhome New Retail Group Corporation Limited is based in Beijing, China.
General.Address: No. 3 , Dongzhimen South Street, Beijing, China, 100 007
